about.title: Experienced Interim executive for Product Development & Engineering
about.text: As an interim executive, I support companies in stabilizin, transforming, and scaling the development and series production of their products, as well as their operational safety and reliability - drawing on solid aerospace expertise and international leadership experience at Airbus and Rolls-Royce in engineering, systems development, and project management. I am specialized in agile transformation, process optimization, change management, crisis resolution, and building high-performance teams. With my strategic mindset, deep technical expertise, and as a strong communicator I combine leadership excellence with engineering depth and transformation skills, even in higly relgulated industries. The result: reliable, safe, and defect-free products - with shorter time-to-market, lower product and service costs, and higher customer satisfaction.

project1.title: Final Assembly Performance Improvement
project1.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project1.text: As leader of the On-Time-Delivery program, I directed a 30-member international team, implemented real-time performance tracking and targeted quality measures. Result: delivery reliability increased from 25% to 100% within 10 months, defects reduced by 75%. KPIs and methods became group-wide standards.

project2.title: Hybrid-Electric Propulsion Certification
project2.subtitle: Industrial Corporation, 350.000 Staff, EUR 76B Revenue
project2.text: I developed a strategic roadmap for Systems Safety, positioned the function at the core of the architecture, and integrated processes into ALM. Through competence building and cross-team networking, safety requirement definition time was cut by 75%, reducing certification risk and accelerating market entry.

project3.title: Engineering Reorganization for Growth
project3.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project3.text: As Senior Manager, I designed a scalable engineering structure, redefined interfaces with programs and sales, and initiated the first company-wide Code of Conduct. Result: enabled growth for three new aircraft programs, improved cross-functional collaboration, and established a governance model adopted across divisions.

project4.title: Industrializing New Structural Technology
project4.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project4.text: As Head of Transversal Engineering, I defined missing industrialization standards together with production and structures teams. Impact: 700 kg weight reduction and USD 500,000 unit cost savings per aircraft through robust standards implementation.

project5.title: Restructuring Systems Standard Parts
project5.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project5.text: I designed and negotiated a central organization for systems standard parts, standardized processes, and demonstrated performance gains through consolidation. Result: 25% workforce reduction and â‚¬ 50M savings by lowering parts variety across subsequent programs.
